title: 1101 Frederica St W APT B
description:
Beautiful 3-Bedroom Rental | Available June 1

Step into comfort and convenience with this stunning 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom home offering 1,225 sq ft of modern living space. Located in a peaceful neighbourhood, this bright and spacious unit is perfect for families, professionals, or anyone seeking high-quality living.

 Features:

1,225 sq ft of beautifully finished space

3 generous bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms

Open-concept living/dining/kitchen with plenty of natural light

In-unit laundry

Premium finishes throughout

 Extras Included:

$3200/month 

Snow removal and grass cutting included no maintenance hassles

Parking available

 Available June 15
Don't miss this opportunity to live in a turn-key home that blends comfort, space, and stress-free living.

Contact us today to schedule a viewing or apply!

title: 325 Archibald St S #1A
description: McKellar Place is a senior living apartment community designed for independent older adults, offering two nutritious meals daily along with a complimentary breakfastall in a comfortable and supportive environment. Each studio at McKellar Place rents for $1,300 per month, which equates to $4.01 per square foot. Additionally, there is a meal plan that costs $700 per month. Renters who move in by June 1, 2025 will receive one month of complimentary meals. Thank you.

title: 337 Grenville Ave UNIT 10
description:
Cozy 1-Bedroom Apartment in Current River $1400/month! 

Looking for your next home sweet home? This charming 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom apartment is available right away and has everything you need!

 Apartment Highlights:

 Rent: $1400/month

 1 spacious bedroom

 1 bathroom

 Gas & water INCLUDED

 Hydro separate

 Dogs negotiable bring your furry friend!

 Laundry in building convenience at your doorstep

 Parking not included

 Location!
Located in the desirable Current River neighborhood, right by Boulevard Lake close to local shops, parks, and more!

Ready to move in? Contact us now to schedule a viewing and make this cozy spot your new home!

title: 448 Hodder Ave
description: Welcome to our charming 3-bedroom, 1-bathroom duplex rental, offering a cozy yet spacious layout perfect for comfortable living. This inviting home features a well-appointed kitchen, a bright living area for relaxation, and three bedrooms ideal for restful nights. With its convenient location and cozy atmosphere, this duplex promises to be the perfect sanctuary for you and your loved ones. Inclusive utilities up to a reasonable cap.

title: 531 Luci Ct
description:
Newly Renovated 3 Bedroom Main Floor Unit Bright & Beautiful! 

 Location: 531 Luci crt
 Rent: $1900/month + 70% utilities (heat, water & hydro)
 Bedrooms: 3
 Bathroom: 1

Welcome to your new home at 531 Luci Court!
This stunning main floor unit has been freshly renovated and is ready for you to move in. 

 Features include: In-unit laundry
 Dishwasher for easy clean-up
 Tons of natural light throughout
 Cozy fireplace perfect for chilly nights
 Private entrance
 Access to yard

Perfect for a small family, professionals, or roommates looking for a spacious, bright, and comfortable place to call home.

Please make sure your tenant profile is complete and reach out to us to schedule a showing!
